title: Level 2: Storm Analysis
description:
A winter storm has passed through Kiruna! Your sensors captured multiple snowflakes.

Each line represents one snowflake's 6-arm pattern:

{{input}}

How many of these snowflakes are perfectly symmetric?

(Remember: symmetric means all 6 arms are identical)
hint: Apply your symmetry check from Level 1 to each line. Count how many snowflakes have all identical arms.
